info.description: This reference guide describes the public APIs supported by the Virtual SmartZone - Essentials 6.0. Use the RESTful API commands described in this guide as an alternative way to manage the controller and its managed APs (in addition to the web and command line interfaces).
info.title: Virtual SmartZone - Essentials
